title: Verify Tasks Multi-Select Feature
description: Verified the implementation of multi-select, bulk actions, and responsive design for the Tasks page.
subtasks: Verified AG Grid configuration for multi-row selection and checkbox column
Verified 'Select All' header checkbox behavior and filtering respect
Verified Bulk Action Bar appearance, CSS transitions, and mobile responsive layout
Verified Bulk Update logic (optimistic UI update + parallel API requests per project)
Verified Bulk Delete logic (confirmation dialog + API sync)
Verified Detail Panel interaction (clicking row ID/Title still works, checkboxes don't trigger panel)
Verified integration with backend endpoints (/api/tasks and /api/projects/:id/work-items)
decisions: Verified via code review and static analysis as runtime environment does not support browser interaction.
Confirmed that the bulk update strategy (re-uploading all tasks for affected projects) aligns with the existing backend architecture.
